item.title: Learn gRPC, Go and Kubernetes by building Microservices
item.description: Intro In this article, we embark on a journey to implement a Backend For Frontend (BFF) and microservices architecture utilizing gRPC and GraphQL. This project serves as an educational endeavor to understand the intricacies of microservices communication and the benefits of using gRPC and GraphQL. Project Structure(Overview) Our project revolves around three essential components: Microservices (gRPC): Weâ€™ll implement two microservices adhering to the Command Query Responsibility Segregation (CQRS) pattern: Command Service: Responsible for executing write operations, handling commands, and modifying data.
